subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Canada beat Tonga, 25-20, in a back-and-forth match Wednesday in New Zealand, making Tonga the first team to lose two matches in the tournament.
snippet: Canada beat Tonga, 25-20, in a back-and-forth match Wednesday in New Zealand, making Tonga the first team to lose two matches in the tournament.
